trans-unit.source: The main difference between a ConvexPolygonShape2D and a ConcavePolygonShape2D is that a concave polygon assumes it is concave and uses a more complex method of collision detection, and a convex one forces itself to be convex in order to speed up collision detection.
trans-unit.target: ConvexPolygonShape2D和 ConcavePolygonShape2D 之间的主要区别在于，凹面多边形假定其为凹面并使用更复杂的碰撞检测方法，而凸面多边形则将自身强制为凸面以加快碰撞检测。

trans-unit.source: The main difference between a ConvexPolygonShape2D and a ConcavePolygonShape2D is that a concave polygon assumes it is concave and uses a more complex method of collision detection, and a convex one forces itself to be convex in order to speed up collision detection.
trans-unit.target: ConvexPolygonShape2D 和ConcavePolygonShape2D之间的主要区别在于，凹面多边形假定其为凹面并使用更复杂的碰撞检测方法，而凸面多边形则将自身强制为凸面以加快碰撞检测。

In reliable or ordered mode, for example, the packet delivery order is ensured on a per-channel basis. This is done to combat latency and reduces ordering restrictions on packets. The delivery status of a packet in one channel won't stall the delivery of other packets in another channel.

The number of channels to be used by ENet. Default: 3. Channels are used to separate different kinds of data. In realiable or ordered mode, for example, the packet delivery order is ensured on a per channel basis.

The number of fixed iterations per second. This controls how often physics simulation and Node._physics_process methods are run. This value should generally always be set to 60 or above, as Godot doesn't interpolate the physics step. As a result, values lower than 60 will look stuttery. This value can be increased to make input more reactive or work around tunneling issues, but keep in mind doing so will increase CPU usage.

trans-unit.source: The peer object to handle the RPC system (effectively enabling networking when set). Depending on the peer itself, the SceneTree will become a network server (check with is_network_server) and will set root node’s network mode to master (see NETWORK_MODE_* constants in Node), or it will become a regular peer with root node set to puppet. All child nodes are set to inherit the network mode by default. Handling of networking-related events (connection, disconnection, new clients) is done by connecting to SceneTree’s signals.
trans-unit.target: 处理RPC系统的对等对象（设置后有效启用联网）。根据对等点本身， SceneTree 将成为网络服务器（请通过is_network_server进行检查），并将根节点的网络模式设置为master（请参见Node中的 NETWORK_MODE_ *常量），或者将其成为常规节点，并将根节点设置为puppet。默认情况下，所有子节点都设置为继承网络模式。通过连接到 SceneTree 的信号来处理与网络相关的事件（连接，断开连接，新客户端）。

trans-unit.source: The peer object to handle the RPC system (effectively enabling networking when set). Depending on the peer itself, the SceneTree will become a network server (check with is_network_server) and will set the root node's network mode to master, or it will become a regular peer with the root node set to puppet. All child nodes are set to inherit the network mode by default. Handling of networking-related events (connection, disconnection, new clients) is done by connecting to SceneTree's signals.

The peer object to handle the RPC system (effectively enabling networking when set). Depending on the peer itself, the MultiplayerAPI will become a network server (check with is_network_server) and will set root node’s network mode to master (see NETWORK_MODE_* constants in Node), or it will become a regular peer with root node set to puppet. All child nodes are set to inherit the network mode by default. Handling of networking-related events (connection, disconnection, new clients) is done by connecting to MultiplayerAPI’s signals.
trans-unit.target: 处理RPC系统的对等对象（设置后有效启用联网）。根据对等方本身，MultiplayerAPI将成为网络服务器（请通过is_network_server进行检查），并将根节点的网络模式设置为master（请参见Node中的 NETWORK_MODE_ *常量），或者将其成为常规节点，并将根节点设置为puppet。默认情况下，所有子节点都设置为继承网络模式。通过连接到MultiplayerAPI的信号来处理与网络相关的事件（连接，断开连接，新客户端）。

trans-unit.source: The peer object to handle the RPC system (effectively enabling networking when set). All child nodes are set to inherit the network mode by default. Handling of networking-related events (connection, disconnection, new clients) is done by connecting to MultiplayerAPI's signals.

trans-unit.source: The points along the Curve2D of the Path2D are precomputed before use, for faster calculations. The point at the requested offset is then calculated interpolating between two adjacent cached points. This may present a problem if the curve makes sharp turns, as the cached points may not follow the curve closely enough.
trans-unit.target: 沿着该点Curve2D中的Path2D使用前预先计算，更快的计算。然后，在两个相邻的缓存点之间进行插值，从而计算出请求偏移处的点。如果曲线急转弯，可能会出现问题，因为缓存的点可能没有足够接近曲线。

trans-unit.source: The points along the Curve3D of the Path are precomputed before use, for faster calculations. The point at the requested offset is then calculated interpolating between two adjacent cached points. This may present a problem if the curve makes sharp turns, as the cached points may not follow the curve closely enough.
trans-unit.target: 在使用之前，将预先计算路径的Curve3D上的点，以加快计算速度。然后，在两个相邻的缓存点之间进行插值，从而计算出请求偏移处的点。如果曲线急转弯，可能会出现问题，因为缓存的点可能没有足够接近曲线。

The return value also depends on the blocking mode. When blocking, the method will return -2 (no process ID information is available in blocking mode). When non-blocking, the method returns a process ID, which you can use to monitor the process (and potentially terminate it with kill). If the process forking (non-blocking) or opening (blocking) fails, the method will return -1.
trans-unit.target: 返回值还取决于阻塞模式。阻塞时，该方法将返回-2（在阻塞模式下没有可用的进程ID信息）。非阻塞时，该方法返回一个进程ID，您可以使用该ID监视进程（并可能通过kill终止该进程）。如果派生（非阻塞）或打开（阻塞）的过程失败，则该方法将返回-1。

trans-unit.source: The return value also depends on the blocking mode. When blocking, the method will return an exit code of the process. When non-blocking, the method returns a process ID, which you can use to monitor the process (and potentially terminate it with kill). If the process forking (non-blocking) or opening (blocking) fails, the method will return -1 or another exit code.

This class needs to be implemented to make an AR or VR platform available to Godot and these should be implemented as C++ modules or GDNative modules (note that for GDNative the subclass ARVRScriptInterface should be used). Part of the interface is exposed to GDScript so you can detect, enable and configure an AR or VR platform.
trans-unit.target: 需要实现这个类来使一个AR或VR平台提供给Godot,这些应该作为C++模块或GDNative模块来实现(注意,对于GDNative应该使用子类ARVRScriptInterface)。该接口的一部分暴露给GDScript,这样你就可以检测、启用和配置AR或VR平台。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to a number of different monitors related to performance, such as memory usage, draw calls, and FPS. These are the same as the values displayed in the Monitor tab in the editor’s Debugger panel. By using the get_monitor method of this class, you can access this data from your code. Note that a few of these monitors are only available in debug mode and will always return 0 when used in a release build.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对许多与性能相关的不同监视器的访问，例如内存使用，绘图调用和FPS。这些与编辑器的“ 调试器”面板的“ 监视”选项卡中显示的值相同。通过使用此类的get_monitor方法，您可以从代码中访问此数据。请注意，其中一些监视器仅在调试模式下可用，并且在发行版中使用时始终返回0。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to a number of different monitors related to performance, such as memory usage, draw calls, and FPS. These are the same as the values displayed in the Monitor tab in the editor's Debugger panel. By using the get_monitor method of this class, you can access this data from your code.
This class represent a specific WebSocket connection, you can do lower level operations with it.
trans-unit.target: 该类代表一个特定的WebSocket连接,您可以对其进行低级操作。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a C# script. It is the C# equivalent of the GDScript class and is only available in Mono-enabled Godot builds.
This class represents a DTLS peer connection. It can be used to connect to a DTLS server, and is returned by DTLSServer.take_connection.
This client can be optionally used as a network peer for the MultiplayerAPI.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择将此客户端用作MultiplayerAPI的网络对等方。

trans-unit.source: This control allows property editing for one or multiple properties into EditorInspector. It is added via EditorInspectorPlugin.

This control provides a selectable list of items that may be in a single (or multiple columns) with option of text, icons, or both text and icon. Tooltips are supported and may be different for every item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 该控件提供了一个可选择的项目列表,可以是单列(或多列),可以选择文本、图标或文本和图标。支持工具提示,列表中的每一个项目都可能是不同的。

trans-unit.source: This controls the drop sections, i.e. the decision and drawing of possible drop locations based on the mouse position.

This determines how much grip this wheel has. It is combined with the friction setting of the surface the wheel is in contact with. 0.0 means no grip, 1.0 is normal grip. For a drift car setup, try setting the grip of the rear wheels slightly lower than the front wheels, or use a lower value to simulate tire wear.
trans-unit.target: 这决定了这个轮子的抓地力有多大。它与轮子所接触的表面的摩擦力设置相结合。0.0表示没有抓地力,1.0为正常抓地力。对于漂移车的设置,可以尝试将后轮的抓地力设置得比前轮略低,或者使用较低的数值来模拟轮胎磨损。

trans-unit.source: This dialog is useful for small notifications to the user about an event. It can only be accepted or closed, with the same result.
trans-unit.target: 该对话框用于向用户发出有关事件的小通知。它只能接受或关闭,结果相同。

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the size of the grid cells themselves, only the items in them. This can be used to make cell items overlap their neighbors.
This does not affect the size of the meshes. See cell_scale.
This effectively allows to have different branches of the scene tree to be managed by different MultiplayerAPI, allowing for example to run both client and server in the same scene.
trans-unit.target: 这有效地允许场景树的不同分支由不同的MultiplayerAPI管理,例如允许在同一场景中同时运行客户端和服务器。

trans-unit.source: This event is emitted when an item of some id is pressed or its accelerator is activated.
trans-unit.target: 当某个id的物品被按下或其加速器被激活时,该事件被发出。

trans-unit.source: This event is emitted when an item of some index is pressed or its accelerator is activated.
trans-unit.target: 当某个索引的项目被按下或其加速器被激活时,该事件被发出。

trans-unit.source: This event is emitted when user navigated to an item of some id using ui_up or ui_down action.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用 ui_up 或 ui_down 操作导航到某个ID的项目时，将发出此事件。

trans-unit.source: This function considers a discretization of rotations into 24 points on unit sphere, lying along the vectors (x,y,z) with each component being either -1, 0, or 1, and returns the index of the point best representing the orientation of the object. It is mainly used by the GridMap editor. For further details, refer to the Godot source code.

This function considers a discretization of rotations into 24 points on unit sphere, lying along the vectors (x,y,z) with each component being either -1,0 or 1, and returns the index of the point best representing the orientation of the object. It is mainly used by the grid map editor. For further details, refer to Godot source code.
trans-unit.target: 该函数考虑将旋转分解为单位球面上的24个点,沿矢量(x,y,z)放置,每个分量为-1,0或1,并返回最能代表物体方向的点的索引。它主要被网格地图编辑器使用。更多细节请参考Godot源码。

trans-unit.source: This function is called when the Spatial this gizmo refers to changes (the Spatial.update_gizmo is called).
This function is called when the Spatial this gizmo refers to changes (the Spatial.update_gizmo is called).
trans-unit.target: 当此gizmo的Spatial引用更改时，将调用此函数（调用Spatial.update_gizmo）。

trans-unit.source: This function is used for plugins that edit specific object types (nodes or resources). It requests the editor to edit the given object.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于编辑特定对象类型(节点或资源)的插件。它请求编辑器编辑给定的对象。

trans-unit.source: This function is used when the user drags a gizmo handle (previously added with add_handles) in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在屏幕坐标中拖动Gizmo手柄（以前添加了add_handles）时，将使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the time left for the current animation to finish (if unsure, just pass the value from the main blend being called).
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回当前动画完成的剩余时间(如果不确定,只需传递被调用的主混合的值)。

trans-unit.source: This function returns what the resumed function call returns, possibly another function state if yielded again.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回恢复的函数调用所返回的内容,如果再次产生,可能是另一个函数状态。

trans-unit.source: This function should return the time left for the current animation to finish (if unsure, pass the value from the main blend being called).
This function will be called when the editor is requested to become visible. It is used for plugins that edit a specific object type.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑器被请求变为可见时,该函数将被调用。它用于编辑特定对象类型的插件。

trans-unit.source: This functions as a seek in the Animation or the blend or mix of Animations input in it.
trans-unit.target: 这在Animation或其中的Animation输入的混合或混合中用作查找。

trans-unit.source: This gives the same result as using SpatialMaterial.CULL_BACK in SpatialMaterial.params_cull_mode.
This has no effect if smoothing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了平滑功能,则没有效果。

trans-unit.source: This helper class can be used to store Variant values on the filesystem using INI-style formatting. The stored values are identified by a section and a key:
trans-unit.target: 该帮助程序类可用于使用INI样式格式将Variant值存储在文件系统上。存储的值由一个部分和一个键标识：

trans-unit.source: This helper creates a MeshInstance child node with gizmos at every vertex calculated from the mesh geometry. It’s mainly used for testing.
trans-unit.target: 该助手创建一个MeshInstance子节点，该子节点在从网格几何体计算出的每个顶点上都有小控件。它主要用于测试。

trans-unit.source: This helper creates a StaticBody child node with a ConcavePolygonShape collision shape calculated from the mesh geometry. It’s mainly used for testing.
trans-unit.target: 该助手将创建一个具有ConcavePolygonShape碰撞形状的StaticBody子节点，该碰撞形状是根据网格几何体计算得出的。它主要用于测试。

trans-unit.source: This helper creates a StaticBody child node with a ConcavePolygonShape collision shape calculated from the mesh geometry. It's mainly used for testing.
This helper creates a StaticBody child node with a ConvexPolygonShape collision shape calculated from the mesh geometry. It’s mainly used for testing.
trans-unit.target: 该助手将创建一个具有ConvexPolygonShape碰撞形状的StaticBody子节点，该碰撞形状是根据网格几何体计算得出的。它主要用于测试。

trans-unit.source: This helper creates a StaticBody child node with a ConvexPolygonShape collision shape calculated from the mesh geometry. It's mainly used for testing.
This helper creates a MeshInstance child node with gizmos at every vertex calculated from the mesh geometry. It's mainly used for testing.

This is a generic mobile VR implementation where you need to provide details about the phone and HMD used. It does not rely on any existing framework. This is the most basic interface we have. For the best effect you do need a mobile phone with a gyroscope and accelerometer.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个通用的移动VR实现,你需要提供使用的手机和HMD的详细信息。它不依赖于任何现有的框架。这是我们最基本的接口。为了达到最好的效果,你确实需要一部带有陀螺仪和加速度计的手机。

trans-unit.source: This is a generic mobile VR implementation where you need to provide details about the phone and HMD used. It does not rely on any existing framework. This is the most basic interface we have. For the best effect, you need a mobile phone with a gyroscope and accelerometer.
This is a helper class to generate a flat Button (see Button.flat), creating a ToolButton is equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个用于生成平面Button的帮助程序类（请参见Button.flat），创建 ToolButton 等效于：

trans-unit.source: This is a helper spatial node for our camera; note that, if stereoscopic rendering is applicable (VR-HMD), most of the camera properties are ignored, as the HMD information overrides them. The only properties that can be trusted are the near and far planes.
trans-unit.target: 这是我们相机的一个辅助空间节点;注意,如果适用立体渲染(VR-HMD),大部分相机属性都会被忽略,因为HMD信息会覆盖它们。唯一可以信任的属性是近平面和远平面。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper spatial node that is linked to the tracking of controllers. It also offers several handy passthroughs to the state of buttons and such on the controllers.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个与控制器的跟踪相连的辅助空间节点。它还为控制器上的按钮等状态提供了几个方便的通道。

trans-unit.source: This is a really important function to understand correctly. AR and VR platforms all handle positioning slightly differently.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常重要的功能,要正确理解。AR和VR平台对定位的处理方式都略有不同。

trans-unit.source: This is a special node within the AR/VR system that maps the physical location of the center of our tracking space to the virtual location within our game world.
trans-unit.target: 这是AR/VR系统中的一个特殊节点,它将我们追踪空间中心的物理位置映射到我们游戏世界中的虚拟位置。

trans-unit.source: This is a useful property to animate if you want the controller to vibrate for a limited duration.
This is a virtual axis on which you can add any type of AnimationNode using add_blend_point.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个虚拟轴，您可以在其上使用add_blend_point添加任何类型的AnimationNode。

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper class for GDNative implementations of the ARVR interface. To use a GDNative ARVR interface simply instantiate this object and set your GDNative library containing the ARVR interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个ARVR接口的GDNative实现的包装器类。要使用GDNative ARVR接口,只需实例化这个对象,并设置包含ARVR接口实现的GDNative库。

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper class for GDNative implementations of the ARVR interface. To use a GDNative ARVR interface, simply instantiate this object and set your GDNative library containing the ARVR interface implementation.
This is a wrapper for the AStar class which uses 2D vectors instead of 3D vectors.
This is also the value used as fallback for StyleBox.content_margin_bottom if it is negative.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是负数，它也是StyleBox.content_margin_bottom的后备值。

trans-unit.source: This is also the value used as fallback for StyleBox.content_margin_left if it is negative.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是负数，则它也是用作StyleBox.content_margin_left的后备值。

trans-unit.source: This is also the value used as fallback for StyleBox.content_margin_right if it is negative.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是负数，则它也是用作StyleBox.content_margin_right的后备值。

trans-unit.source: This is also the value used as fallback for StyleBox.content_margin_top if it is negative.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是负数，则它也是用作StyleBox.content_margin_top的后备值。

trans-unit.source: This is an FBX 3D asset importer based on Assimp. It currently has many known limitations and works best with static meshes. Most animated meshes won't import correctly.
This is an important function to understand correctly. AR and VR platforms all handle positioning slightly differently.
This is equivalent to add_force(force, Vector3(0,0,0)).
trans-unit.target: 这等效于 add_force(force, Vector3(0,0,0)) 。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to apply_impulse(Vector3(0, 0, 0), impulse).
trans-unit.target: 这等效于 apply_impulse(Vector3(0, 0, 0), impulse) 。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to apply_impulse(Vector3(0,0,0), impulse).
trans-unit.target: 这等效于 apply_impulse(Vector3(0,0,0), impulse) 。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to a Basis with no rotation or shearing and this vector's components set as the scale.
This is equivalent to first wrapping the texture in an AtlasTexture with the same region.
trans-unit.target: 这等效于首先将纹理包装在具有相同区域的AtlasTexture中。

trans-unit.source: This is for editors that edit script based objects. You can return a list of breakpoints in the format (script:line), for example: res://path_to_script.gd:25
trans-unit.target: 这是为编辑基于脚本对象的编辑器而设的。你可以返回格式为(script:line)的断点列表,例如:res://path_to_script.gd:25。

trans-unit.source: This is for editors that edit script-based objects. You can return a list of breakpoints in the format (script:line), for example: res://path_to_script.gd:25.
This is identical to calling Basis() without any parameters. This constant can be used to make your code clearer, and for consistency with C#.

This is multiplied by the global 3D gravity setting found in “Project > Project Settings > Physics > 3d” to produce RigidBody’s gravity. E.g. a value of 1 will be normal gravity, 2 will apply double gravity, and 0.5 will apply half gravity to this object.
trans-unit.target: 乘以“项目>项目设置>物理> 3d”中的全局​​3D重力设置，即可得出RigidBody的重力。例如，值为1表示法向重力，值为2表示双重重力，值为0.5表示一半重力。

trans-unit.source: This is multiplied by the global 3D gravity setting found in Project > Project Settings > Physics > 3d to produce RigidBody's gravity. For example, a value of 1 will be normal gravity, 2 will apply double gravity, and 0.5 will apply half gravity to this object.
This is our AR/VR Server.
trans-unit.target: 这是我们的AR/VR服务器。

trans-unit.source: This is the CSG base class that provides CSG operation support to the various CSG nodes in Godot.
trans-unit.target: 这是CSG基类,为Godot中的各种CSG节点提供CSG操作支持。

trans-unit.source: This is the built-in string class (and the one used by GDScript). It supports Unicode and provides all necessary means for string handling. Strings are reference counted and use a copy-on-write approach, so passing them around is cheap in resources.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个内置的字符串类(也是GDScript使用的类)。它支持Unicode,并提供了处理字符串的所有必要手段。字符串是有引用计数的,并且使用写时复制的方式,所以传来传去的资源很便宜。

trans-unit.source: This is the built-in string class (and the one used by GDScript). It supports Unicode and provides all necessary means for string handling. Strings are reference-counted and use a copy-on-write approach, so passing them around is cheap in resources.

This is the distance in meters the wheel is lowered from its origin point. Don’t set this to 0.0 and move the wheel into position, instead move the origin point of your wheel (the gizmo in Godot) to the position the wheel will take when bottoming out, then use the rest length to move the wheel down to the position it should be in when the car is in rest.
trans-unit.target: 这是车轮从其原点下降的距离（以米为单位）。不要将此值设置为0.0并将轮子移到适当位置，而应将轮子的原点（Godot中的Gizmo）移动到达到最低点时轮子将要到达的位置，然后使用剩余长度将轮子向下移动到汽车静止时应处于的位置。

trans-unit.source: This is the distance in meters the wheel is lowered from its origin point. Don't set this to 0.0 and move the wheel into position, instead move the origin point of your wheel (the gizmo in Godot) to the position the wheel will take when bottoming out, then use the rest length to move the wheel down to the position it should be in when the car is in rest.
This is the distance the suspension can travel. As Godot measures are in meters keep this setting relatively low. Try a value between 0.1 and 0.3 depending on the type of car .
trans-unit.target: 这是悬架可以移动的距离。由于Godot的测量单位是米,所以要将此设置相对降低。根据汽车的类型,尝试在0.1和0.3之间的数值。

trans-unit.source: This is the distance the suspension can travel. As Godot units are equivalent to meters, keep this setting relatively low. Try a value between 0.1 and 0.3 depending on the type of car.
This is the inverse of char.
This is the inverse of ord.

This is the node that implements full 3D physics. This means that you do not control a RigidBody directly. Instead you can apply forces to it (gravity, impulses, etc.), and the physics simulation will calculate the resulting movement, collision, bouncing, rotating, etc.
trans-unit.target: 这是实现全3D物理的节点。这意味着你并不能直接控制一个RigidBody,而是可以对它施加力(重力、脉冲等),物理模拟会计算出由此产生的运动、碰撞、弹跳。相反,你可以对它施加力(重力、脉冲等),物理模拟将计算由此产生的运动、碰撞、反弹、旋转等。

trans-unit.source: This is the node that implements full 3D physics. This means that you do not control a RigidBody directly. Instead, you can apply forces to it (gravity, impulses, etc.), and the physics simulation will calculate the resulting movement, collision, bouncing, rotating, etc.
This is used by VisualScriptCondition to redirect the sequence to the "Done" port after the true/false branch has finished execution.
This is used by VisualScriptCondition to redirect the sequence to the “Done” port after the true/false branch has finished execution.
trans-unit.target: 在 true / false 分支完成执行之后，VisualScriptCondition使用它来将序列重定向到“ Done”端口。

trans-unit.source: This is used by servers when used in multi-threading mode (servers and visual). RIDs are preallocated to avoid stalling the server requesting them on threads. If servers get stalled too often when loading resources in a thread, increase this number.
trans-unit.target: 这是在多线程模式下(服务器和视觉)使用时,服务器使用的。RID是预先分配的,以避免在线程上请求它们的服务器停滞。如果服务器在线程中加载资源时经常被停滞,请增加这个数字。

trans-unit.source: This is used internally and should not have to be called from user scripts. See joy_connection_changed for the signal emitted when this is triggered internally.
This is used, for example, in shader editors to let the plugin know that it must apply the shader code being written by the user to the object.
trans-unit.target: 例如,在着色器编辑器中,这用于让插件知道它必须将用户正在编写的着色器代码应用到对象上。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for code that needs to run only once when an action is pressed, instead of every frame while it’s pressed.
trans-unit.target: 这对于在按下某个动作时只需要运行一次，而不是在按下某帧时只运行一次的代码很有用。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for code that needs to run only once when an action is pressed, instead of every frame while it's pressed.
This is useful mostly to check if something changed from a saved version.
trans-unit.target: 这主要是用来检查保存的版本是否有变化。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to optimize the rendering of a high amount of instances of a given mesh (for example tree in a forest or grass strands).
trans-unit.target: 这对于优化给定网格的大量实例(例如森林中的树木或草束)的渲染非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to optimize the rendering of a high amount of instances of a given mesh (for example trees in a forest or grass strands).
This kind of button is primarily used when the interaction with the button causes a context change (like linking to a web page).
This kind of buttons are primarily used when the interaction with the button causes a context change (like linking to a web page).
trans-unit.target: 这种按钮主要用于与按钮的交互引起上下文变化(如链接到网页)时。

trans-unit.source: This margin is useful for when the SpringArm has a Camera as a child node: without the margin, the Camera would be placed on the exact point of collision, while with the margin the Camera would be placed close to the point of collision.

This means that when adding a node to the scene tree, the following order will be used for the callbacks: _enter_tree of the parent, _enter_tree of the children, _ready of the children and finally _ready of the parent (recursively for the entire scene tree).
trans-unit.target: 这意味着增加了场景树节点时，按下列顺序将用于回调：_enter_tree父，_enter_tree孩子，_ready孩子终于_ready父（递归整个场景树）的。

trans-unit.source: This method (like the in operator) will evaluate to true as long as the key exists, even if the associated value is null.

This method allows you to center our tracker on the location of the HMD, it will take the current location of the HMD and use that to adjust all our tracking data in essence realigning the real world to your players current position in your game world.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法可以让你把我们的追踪器集中在HMD的位置上,它将采取HMD的当前位置,并利用这个位置来调整我们所有的追踪数据,本质上是将现实世界与你的玩家在你的游戏世界中的当前位置进行调整。

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to center your tracker on the location of the HMD. It will take the current location of the HMD and use that to adjust all your tracking data; in essence, realigning the real world to your player's current position in the game world.
This method can be overridden to hide specific import options if conditions are met. This is mainly useful for hiding options that depend on others if one of them is disabled. For example:
This method does not account for translation (the origin vector).
This method has slightly different behavior based on whether the blocking mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 根据是否启用了 blocking 模式，此方法的行为略有不同。

trans-unit.source: This method is a shorthand for play with custom_speed = -1.0 and from_end = true, so see its description for more information.
This method is called after the editor saves the project or when it’s closed. It asks the plugin to save edited external scenes/resources.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器保存项目后或关闭项目时，将调用此方法。它要求插件保存已编辑的外部场景/资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the editor saves the project or when it's closed. It asks the plugin to save edited external scenes/resources.
This method is called when a resource with resource_local_to_scene enabled is loaded from a PackedScene instantiation. Its behavior can be customized by overriding _setup_local_to_scene from script.
trans-unit.target: 从PackedScene实例加载启用了resource_local_to_scene的资源时，将调用此方法。可以通过覆盖脚本中的_setup_local_to_scene来自定义其行为。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the editor is about to save the project, switch to another tab, etc. It asks the plugin to apply any pending state changes to ensure consistency.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑器要保存项目、切换到另一个标签页等时,会调用这个方法。它要求插件应用任何悬而未决的状态变化以确保一致性。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when there is an input event in the 2D viewport, e.g. the user clicks with the mouse in the 2D space (canvas GUI). Keep in mind that for this method to be called you have to first declare the virtual method handles so the editor knows that you want to work with the workspace:

This method is faster than using is_equal_approx with one value as zero.
This method must be overridden to do the actual importing work. See this class' description for an example of overriding this method.

This method needs the transformation matrix for this shape (local_xform), the movement to test on this shape (local_motion), the shape to check collisions with (with_shape), the transformation matrix of that shape (shape_xform), and the movement to test onto the other object (shape_motion).
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要此形状的转换矩阵（ local_xform ），要在该形状上测试的运动（ local_motion ），检查与（ with_shape ）碰撞的形状，该形状的转换矩阵（ shape_xform ）以及要测试到的运动另一个对象（ shape_motion ）。

trans-unit.source: This method resets the state of the object, as if it was freshly created. Namely, it unassigns the regular expression of this object.
This method resets the state of the object, as it was freshly created. Namely, it unassigns the regular expression of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重置对象的状态,因为它是新创建的。也就是说,它解除了这个对象的正则表达式。

This method should be used in Node._physics_process (or in a method called by Node._physics_process), as it uses the physics step's delta value automatically in calculations. Otherwise, the simulation will run at an incorrect speed.
This method should not be used for System libraries as they are already present on the device.
This method should only be used to test the data. Process the data in drop_data.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅应用于测试数据。处理drop_data中的数据。

This node allows you to blend linearly between three animations using a Vector2 weight.
trans-unit.target: 该节点允许您使用Vector2权重在三个动画之间线性混合。

trans-unit.source: This node allows you to create a box for use with the CSG system.
trans-unit.target: 该节点允许您创建一个用于CSG系统的盒子。

trans-unit.source: This node allows you to create a cylinder (or cone) for use with the CSG system.
trans-unit.target: 该节点允许您创建一个圆柱体(或锥体),用于CSG系统。

trans-unit.source: This node allows you to create a sphere for use with the CSG system.
trans-unit.target: 该节点允许您创建一个用于CSG系统的球体。

trans-unit.source: This node allows you to create a torus for use with the CSG system.
trans-unit.target: 该节点允许您创建一个用于CSG系统的环形图。

trans-unit.source: This node can be used to cause a seek command to happen to any sub-children of the graph. After setting the time, this value returns to -1.
This node extends Camera to add collisions with Area and/or PhysicsBody nodes. The camera cannot move through colliding objects.
This node has three inputs:
trans-unit.target: 这个节点有三个输入。

trans-unit.source: This node implements all the physics logic needed to simulate a car. It is based on the raycast vehicle system commonly found in physics engines. You will need to add a CollisionShape for the main body of your vehicle and add VehicleWheel nodes for the wheels. You should also add a MeshInstance to this node for the 3D model of your car but this model should not include meshes for the wheels. You should control the vehicle by using the brake, engine_force, and steering properties and not change the position or orientation of this node directly.

This node implements simulated 2D physics. You do not control a RigidBody2D directly. Instead you apply forces to it (gravity, impulses, etc.) and the physics simulation calculates the resulting movement based on its mass, friction, and other physical properties.
trans-unit.target: 这个节点实现了模拟的2D物理。你不能直接控制一个RigidBody2D,而是对它施加力(重力、脉冲等),物理模拟根据它的质量、摩擦力和其他物理属性计算出结果。相反,你对它施加力(重力、脉冲等),物理模拟会根据它的质量、摩擦力和其他物理属性计算出结果的运动。

trans-unit.source: This node inherits from Node2D. Unlike with Control nodes, you cannot set anchors on it. If you want to create menus or user interfaces, you may want to use Button nodes instead. To make button nodes react to touch events, you can enable the Emulate Mouse option in the Project Settings.

This node is intended to be a simple helper to get things going quickly and it may happen often that more functionality is desired to change how the camera works. To make your own custom camera node, simply inherit from Node2D and change the transform of the canvas by calling get_viewport().set_canvas_transform(m) in Viewport.
trans-unit.target: 该节点旨在成为使事情快速进行的简单助手，并且可能经常需要更多功能来更改相机的工作方式。要创建自己的自定义相机节点，只需从Node2D继承并通过在Viewport中调用get_viewport（）。set_canvas_transform（m）来更改画布的变换即可。

trans-unit.source: This node is intended to be a simple helper to get things going quickly and it may happen that more functionality is desired to change how the camera works. To make your own custom camera node, inherit from Node2D and change the transform of the canvas by setting Viewport.canvas_transform in Viewport (you can obtain the current Viewport by using Node.get_viewport).
